amendment.description: To increase the funds for research and development related to transportation security, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 1343 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1343 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 51. Record Vote Number: 295.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1343.
Amendment SA 1343 proposed by Senator Schumer. (consideration: CR S9763-9767, S9774) To increase the funds for research and development related to transportation security, and for other purposes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1343 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 51. Record Vote Number: 295.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1343 proposed by Senator Schumer.
